name: hetzner-cloud-deploy-server-action
description: Deploy a Hetzner Cloud Server from a GitHub Action.

scripts.build: npm run build:deploy && npm run build:clean
scripts.release:v2: npm run build && git add --all && git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG" && git push origin main && git tag -d v2 && git push --delete origin v2 && git tag -a -m "$COMMIT_MSG" v2 && git push --follow-tags
